name: McKinley Elementary School
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grades: TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper A small school serving a diverse group of children from many areas of the city. Offering enrichment programs such as Adventures in Music, Artist in Residence, and Music as well as many special events during the year. And the Afterschool Enrichment Program runs a high quality, licensed, on-site program.
